block.p: Jaime Butterman, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Weingarten of Hewlett Harbor, L.I., was married last night to Dr. Adam Goodman, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Joel Goodman of Riverdale, the Bronx. Rabbi Stuart Geller performed the ceremony at the Woodmere (L.I.) Country Club. Mrs. Goodman, 27 years old, is a financial consultant at Lehman Brothers in New York. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. Dr. Goodman, 27, is a dentist in the Bronx. He graduated from the State University at Albany and received a D.M.D. degree from Penn.

Rabbi Stuart Geller performed the ceremony at the Woodmere (L.I.) Country Club. Mrs. Goodman, 27 years old, is a financial consultant at Lehman Brothers in New York. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. Dr. Goodman, 27, is a dentist in the Bronx. He graduated from the State University at Albany and received a D.M.D. degree from Penn.
